body.name: elitespace Queen Mattresses,12 Inch Queen Size Mattress in a Box,Memory Foam Hybrid White Mattress with Provide Support and Improve Sleep Mattresses,CertiPUR-US 100 Nights Trial.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 17 hrs 43 mins
features: Queen Mattresses Sweet Sleep and Comfortable Support: elitespace 12 inch queen size mattresses memory foam mixed with multi-layer foam and independent spring support system ensures that your weight is evenly distributed from head to toe and provides targeted support to fully relax muscles and enjoy a good sleep experience.

Queen Mattresses Breathable and Healthy: The 12 inch mattress is made of high-density first-class thermal material, which is comfortable and breathable, and can discharge the steam and sweat from the contact surface between you and the mattress, so that you can keep your body comfortable and dry during sleep. The mattresses independent pocket spring system can Enhanced air circulation prevents trapped heat for a cool and comfortable sleep.

Queen Mattresses High-quality Top Sponge: elitespace queen size spring mattress is made of high-quality knitted fabric, multi-layer high-quality sponge keeps you away from back pain. All memory foam is CertiPUR-US certified and tested to be free of harmful substances.

Queen Mattresses Quiet and Independent Spring: built-in high-quality independent pocket spring and slow rebound sponge, which can effectively absorb the noise and vibration caused by turning over during sleep, do not disturb your companions, and sleep peacefully. The support system consists of hundreds of independent pockets of Composed of spring coils, it has excellent shock absorption and elasticity, and can effectively adjust the quality of sleep.

Queen Mattresses Worry Free Guaranteed: Please allow 24 - 72 hours for your mattress to return to its full shape after opening the mattress. Meanwhile elitespace mattress comes with 100-night trial and 10-year support. If you have any unsatisfactory issues, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great delivery process in just two days. Very comfortable and perfect on the metal platform that I selected. I'm using it as a sofa by day and sleeping for guests in my multi purpose bedroom. I used some great linens also from Amazon and it looks very "haute designer" for a very reasonable price. Good investment,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for good price!
reviews.reviewText: We just moved into our new house and required a second bed for our spare bedroom. The delivery on the mattress was prompt and once expanded and placed it was perfect. Good quality, very comfortable and a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very great bed for the price!
reviews.reviewText: We ordered the 12 inch queen and we are extremely pleased with the bed. It’s great mix of plush and firm. You don’t feel the coils at all! 5 out of 5 stars! Decompressed almost instantly once unsealed and it’s a true 12”...and it came a day earlier than anticipated so that was a ➕

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to unpack!
reviews.reviewText: Hubby and I unpacked it. I was nervous when I saw the box come, but it was just well compressed. It quickly “recovered” to natural size and shape. It took us 5-10 minutes to remove from the box and plastic. It fit perfectly on the queen sized bed frame in our guest bedroom and it’s soft. Leaving it for 48 hours before I first make the bed. I hope it remains all the rave these other reviews said it would be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mattress I listed as firm, I would say it is medium it isn’t firm. Still great quality and comfortable but it is not labeled correctly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A GREAT MATTRESS FOR THE PRICE....VERY SUPPORTIVE AND COMFORTABLE.
reviews.reviewText: YES...as others have written here, you do not want to be in front of these mattresses when you cut the plastic (tool provided)....it's like a massive jack in the box, on STEROIDS...could be dangerous...but I read a review here and was ready for it, and managed to stay out of it's way. I LOVE THIS MATTRESS...I got it for under $200 and it's about the wisest $200 bucks I've ever spent. They went up thirty dollars, after I purchased mine...timing is EVERYTHING....that said, I'd have been happy to pay the extra $30 for a mattress of this caliber.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mattress for the price
reviews.reviewText: I used this for my daughter's bed, it's a great size in terms of thickness, very comfortable. The top is very soft my daughter loves it very much. I would recommend this for both children and adults.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything great with this matress. Light, thick, not collapsing but also pretty soft matress. Quality is good !
